sub_categories.name: Activity Indicator
sub_categories.description: A view that shows that a task is in progress.

sub_categories.name: Skeleton
sub_categories.description: While the processes are working, usually developers place a loading view to show users that something is going on and prepare them for which contents are waiting.

sub_categories.name: Action Sheet
sub_categories.description: An action sheet is a specific style of alert that presents two or more choices related to the current context.

sub_categories.name: Alert
sub_categories.description: Alerts convey important information related to the state of your app or the device, and often request feedback.

sub_categories.name: Animation
sub_categories.description: List of animations.

sub_categories.name: Effects
sub_categories.description: List of ready-use effects.

sub_categories.name: Transition
sub_categories.description: List of animation transitions.

sub_categories.name: Calendar
sub_categories.description: List of components and ready-use calendars.

sub_categories.name: Cards
sub_categories.description: List of cards.

sub_categories.name: Control
sub_categories.description: Visual elements that convey a specific action or intention in response to user interactions.

sub_categories.name: Button
sub_categories.description: A control that executes your custom code in response to user interactions.

sub_categories.name: Segment Control
sub_categories.description: A control that consists of multiple segments, each segment functioning as a discrete button.

sub_categories.name: Slider
sub_categories.description: A control for selecting a single value from a continuous range of values.

sub_categories.name: Switch
sub_categories.description: A control that offers a binary choice, such as on/off.

sub_categories.name: Text Field
sub_categories.description: An object that displays an editable text area in your interface.

sub_categories.name: Text View
sub_categories.description: A scrollable, multiline text region.

sub_categories.name: Collection View
sub_categories.description: An object that manages an ordered collection of data items and presents them using customizable layouts.

sub_categories.name: Layout
sub_categories.description: An object that manages an ordered collection of data items and presents them using customizable layouts.

sub_categories.name: Controller
sub_categories.description: An object that manages a view hierarchy for your UIKit app.

sub_categories.name: Messages
sub_categories.description: Replicate messages controller with message views.

sub_categories.label: label
sub_categories.name: Label
sub_categories.description: A view that displays one or more lines of informational text.

sub_categories.name: Menu
sub_categories.description: List of menus.

sub_categories.name: Progress Indicator
sub_categories.description: A view that depicts the progress of a task over time.

sub_categories.name: Tab Bar
sub_categories.description: A control that displays one or more buttons in a tab bar for selecting between different subtasks, views, or modes in an app.

sub_categories.name: Table View
sub_categories.description: A view that presents data using rows in a single column.
